page.title: 14CHANGE IN SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: {COMMENTS ON CHANGES. a){PEOPLE. }Although people had less children, and families were smaller, many more houses had been built and bungalows in particular. Some old houses had developed serious cracks, and had been knocked down and new houses built instead. Many new people have moved in the area from towns. Most settle in very well, but some find it too lonely and leave . Some buildings have vanished from the village, for example two pubs and the Methodist Chapel. b){FACILITIES.}Although the village shop is now much bigger and stocks almost all everyday needs, there used to be three shops here. Public transport is much as it has always been - very poor. Most people cycled everywhere until cars became popular.
